# removeWindowsItem(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the Window menu item for a given window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeWindowsItem(_ win: NSWindow)
```

## Parameters

- **win**: The window whose menu item is to be removed.

## Discussion

This method doesn’t prevent the item from being automatically added again. Use the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/isExcludedFromWindowsMenu] method of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow] if you want the item to remain excluded from the Window menu.

## Managing the Window Menu

- **windowsMenu**: The Window menu of the app.
- **addWindowsItem(_:title:filename:)**: Adds an item to the Window menu for a given window.
- **changeWindowsItem(_:title:filename:)**: Changes the item for a given window in the Window menu to a given string.
- **updateWindowsItem(_:)**: Updates the Window menu item for a given window to reflect the edited status of that window.
